name: places/ChIJMSSxPeVYwokRZOo9LK2EGzE
formattedAddress: 234 E 60th St, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 234 E 60th St, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text: With the infuriating bogus "opioid crisis" making it nearly impossible to find a doctor who will write the scripts, it's a small, independent practice and the doctor follows all the rules and requires you to do all the illicit drug testing first before you can get the script. So this place has been a lifesaver for me. Five stars. And the staff is incredible as well. Very concerned, very sweet, always helpful, never rushing you out the door. That's a rarity in New York City.

originalText.text: The Wellness Center is a warm and welcoming place with experienced, healing and informative professionals who are genuinely caring and dedicated to giving personalized wholistic treatment. They were up front about the type of, time line and cost of the treatment plan as well as sensitive to my financial situation.  I feel so fortunate to be here.

They were up front about the type of, time line and cost of the treatment plan as well as sensitive to my financial situation.  I feel so fortunate to be here.

originalText.text: I've been under chiropractic care for almost 30 years. My previous Chiropractor retired and recommended Dr. Craig and Dr. Shelby to me as a  transition team for my wellness program. Best recommendation ever!  I've been under care with them for the past 2 years and have never felt better. They are a fabulous team, along with Donna who is the best office manager EVER, they all are now considered family to both me and my wife, who has also become a patient. The Wellness Center is not just a top flight holistic treatment facility it is a family, comprised of highly educated/trained, and caring professionals who do everything in their power to keep people healthy in a time where overall health is at a premium. I can't recommend The Wellness Center of NY highly enough.

originalText.text:
I had an appointment at 10:30am and arrived 10:15am. When I arrived no one at the Front Desk so I seated and waited for about 10 mins before Front Desk showed up. She greeted me and gave me a form to fill out. Once i’m done I turn back the form was told by that the Front Desk I will be called once it’s my turn. I’ve waited for almost an hour before the Front Desk called me and I told her I would need to cancel because I have a client at 12pm.

I understand that it was so busy that day but there should be at least two Front Desk working on the busiest day. Almost an hour waiting is unacceptable, and most of all unprofessional. You need to respect your clients time.

originalText.text: The Wellness Center of NY is one of the best health/healing/self care experiences I ever had. Dr. Craig is a master of his craft and  offers a combination of excellent technique with cutting edge information. You will absolutely love Donna too. Of you are seeking out chiropractic care, this is the place.
